naslov: Kuca s poslovnim prostorom i dva stana u srcu stare gradske jezgre (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodajemo prekrasnu, potpuno obnovljenu te unikatno uredenu kamenu kucu s bogatom povjescu u srcu stare gradske jezgre. Kuca je poslovno-stambene namjene. Dvostrane je orijentacije, sto nije uobicajno za kuce u staroj gradskoj jezgri. Tlocrtno 54m2,  prostire se na pet etaza s ukupno cca. 170m2 korisne (netto) povrsine. U prizemlju se nalazi svjeze renovirani poslovni prostor za razlicite namjene, s ishodenim minimalnim tehnickim uvijetima za pripremu hrane. Poslovni prostor ima dva ulaza s dvije paralelne ulice. S juzne strane se nalazi trgic na kojem postoji mogucnost najma vanjske terase. Na prvom katu je studio apartman, a na posljednja tri kata prostire se troetazni stan izvrsne atmosfere s dvije terase okrenute na sjever i jug. Kuca je sagradena jos u 16st. mijenjajuci svrhe, da bi se početkom 20. stoljeća koristila kao Dom izumitelja gdje su se izrađivali patentirani lonci za destilerije za najveće proizvođače pića u to vrijeme. Upravo potonje je bila inspiracija prilikom preuredenja poslovnog prostora. S posljednjih katova kuce i terasa pruza se pogled na Sibenski kanal s juzne strane i krovove kuca stare gradske jezgre sa sjeverne, sto stanovanju u ovoj kuci daje poseban sarm i autenticni dozivljaj starog mediteranskog grada. Kuca odise toplinom, udobnoscu i pozitivnom energijom. U neposrednoj blizini su svi kulturni i egzistencijalni sadrzaji, more i setnice. Papiri uredni, vlasništvo 1/1, nema tereta. Prodaje vlasnica kuce. "Beautiful, completely renovated and uniquely decorated stone house with a rich history for sale in the heart of the old city center. The house is for commercial and residential purposes. It has a two-sided orientation, which is not usual for houses in the old town. The floor plan is 54m2, it extends over five floors with a total of approx. 170m2 of usable area. On the ground floor there is a freshly renovated business space for various purposes. The business space has two entrances from two parallel streets. On the south side there is a square where is possible to rent an outdoor bar terrace. On the first floor there is a vibey studio apartment and on the last three floors there is a three-story apartment with an excellent atmosphere and two terraces facing north and south. The house was built in the 16th century. At the beginning of the 20th century it was used as the House of Inventors where patented stills were made for distilleries for the largest beverage producers at that time. The latter was the inspiration during the renovation of bussness space. From the top floors of the house and the terraces, there is a view of the Sibenik Canal and the sea and the roofs of the houses in the old city center, which gives living in this house a special charm and an authentic experience of an old Mediterranean city. The house exudes warmth, comfort and positive energy. In the immediate vicinity are all cultural and existential contents and the sea. Papers in order, ownership 1/1, no encumbrances. For sale by the owner of the house, no agency commission."
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
